# Week 7: Analysis of Variance (One-Way) {#sec-week07}

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Express ANOVA as a linear model
2. Construct design matrices for categorical predictors
3. Partition total variation into model and error components
4. Conduct F-tests for treatment effects
